infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Dashboard to use your camera to upload your avatar images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow Dashboard to use your location when in app to record your running, swimming, cycling or biking routes on a map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Allow Dashboard to use your location all the time when your screen is locked or your app is in the background to record your routes on a map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Allow Dashboard to use your location all the time when your screen is locked or your app is in the background to record your routes on a map.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Give Dashboard permission to access your photos to upload your avatar images or upload your tracks' photos.
